Other things to note
Check out time is 11a. Late check out fee is $10/hour charged by hour, + $20 fee if the cleaner has to make another trip to clean.

replace fee or the extra handwash fee $10-20 per item.

name: 201C monthly rental room with private bath BU Med
neighborhood_overview: 5 min walk to dudley sq bus station, silver line 4 and 5 to BU medical area, Tufts Medical, Emerson college, down town, bus 66 to Brigham Circle, Harvard school of public health, Bus right at Moreland and Warren st 13 min to Northeastern University, connects to orange line Roxbury Crossing and Ruggles station, bus 23 runs along longwood ave, MCPHS, MASS ART College, WIT, Simmons, Rt1 bus goes along Mass Ave to MIT, Havard sq. Bus 14 goes to VA hospital. Silver line 4, 5 to south station change to SL1 to Logan airport. Parking on street no permit required. Some small street might require stickers on weekday 8-6, read the signs. getting around check mbta westsite.
